name: Grandia: Digital Museum
overview: Grandia: Digital Museum is a spin-off to the Grandia role-playing franchise that acts as somewhat of an expansion pack to the original Grandia as well as a digital collection of artwork, music and other materials from the game. The title has the original protagonists exploring a mysterious museum created in honor of their adventures from the first Grandia. However, pieces from the exhibition have been stolen so Justin and his friends must explore dungeons and fight various enemies to return the materials back to the museum.
